name: Kraken, the Defender
description:
Are you fed up with all the plastic waste that is polluting our oceans? Well so is this tiny Kraken, and he decided to take the matters into his own tentacles.

- Have fun in a friendly shoot-em-up, where not a single creature gets killed
- Play as a brave Kraken, and free the suffering marine life from the plastic pollution
- Use various powerups to your ink weapon, to destroy plastic more efficiently
- Use Health and Armor Powerups to survive the toxic water, that sips from plastic trash

Supports English and Polish Language.

I hope you'll give it a try, and I'll appreciate any feedback. Tell me what you think of the concept, and was the execution good or not. Hopefully you'll have fun, and I'll learn a thing or two :)

I also have to credit the wonderful creators of the free assets, that I've used for this game:

Music is created by Kevin MacLeod from incompetech.org (he's got a massive library of great tracks, available for free under Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License). The ones I've used are:

"Captain Scurvy"
"Cyborg Ninja"
"Nowhere Land"
"Kick Shock"

Sounds are taken from freesound.org (free license)
